Name: CABIN COLD-SOAK
checklistText:
Cabin Cold-Soak Operation

	a.	Activate Cold Soak
			Open cool cont atten pnl

				WARNING
Panel 382:
		SUIT FLOW RELF vlv must remain
		OFF throughout mission or swell-
		ing of CO2 odor absorber filters
		may result.

		SUIT HT EXCH SEC GLY - FLOW
		SEC EVAP H2O CONT vlv - AUTO
		Close cool cont atten pnl
Panel 2:
		CAB TEMP - MAN
Panel 303:
		PRIM CAB TEMP vlv - COLD (CW)
		SEC CAB TEMP vlv - OFF (CCW)
Panel 2:
		SUIT HT EXCH - BYP for 20 sec,
			then off (ctr)
		ECS IND sel - SEC
		SEC COOL PUMP - AC1
			SEC GLY DISCH PRESS ind - 39-51 psig
			SEC ACCUM QTY ind - 30-55%
		SEC COOL EVAP - EVAP
			SEC GLY EVAP OUT TEMP ind -
				38째-50.5째F
			SEC GLY EVAP STM PRESS ind
				When boiling - 0.09-0.14 psia
				Not boiling - >0.14 psia
Panel 2:
		ECS IND sel - PRIM
			RD PRIM OUT TEMP ind - >-20째F
				if <-20째F

			SEC COOL EVAP - RSET for
				58 sec min, then off
					(ctr)
			SEC COOL PUMP - off (ctr)
			SUIT HT EXCH - ON for
				20 sec, then off
				(ctr)

	b.	Deactivate Cold Soak

Panel 303:
		SEC CAB TEMP vlv - MAX COOL (CW)
Panel 2:
		CAB TEMP - AUTO
		SUIT HT EXch - ON for 20 sec,
			then off (ctr)
		SEC COOL EVAP - RSET for 58 sec
			min, then off (ctr)
		SEC COOL PUMP - off (ctr)
		Open cool cont atten pnl


			WARNING

Panel 382:
		SUIT FLOW RELF vlv must remain
		OFF throughout msn or swelling
		of CO2 odor absorber filters
		may result.

		SEC EVAP H2O CONT vlv - OFF
		Close cool cont atten pnl
